content:
We're hiring in all areas of Computer Science and Software Engineering. We already have many people who use category theory in their work all the time, we'd love to have more. Your main work should be in CS/SE though.

https://careers.mcmaster.ca/psp/prepprd/EMPLOYEE/HRMS/c/HRS_HRAM.HRS_APP_SCHJOB.GBL?Page=HRS_APP_JBPST&Action=U&FOCUS=Applicant&SiteId=1000&JobOpeningId=35597&PostingSeq=1
